Detailed Description

This is the internal Header for EDMA hardware attributes definition. This header file should NOT be directly included by applications.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define EDMA_INTERRUPT_NOT_CONNECTED_ID   ((uint16_t)(0xFFFF))

brief In some devices, EDMA interrupts are not mapped to interrupt space of the processor, use max 16-bit value as a identifier to designate such cases.
